mapper.select: select sum(nc_inactivatedVaccine) nc_inactivatedVaccine, sum(nc_inactivatedImmuneAmount) nc_inactivatedImmuneAmount, sum(nc_inactivatedShouldAmount) nc_inactivatedShouldAmount, sum(nc_jointImmuneAmount) nc_jointImmuneAmount, sum(nc_jointShouldAmount) nc_jointShouldAmount, sum(nc_jointVaccine) nc_jointVaccine from animal_disease.b_wnewcastle where nc_regionCode=#{regionCode} AND nc_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime}

select sum(nc_inactivatedVaccine) nc_inactivatedVaccine, sum(nc_inactivatedImmuneAmount) nc_inactivatedImmuneAmount, sum(nc_inactivatedShouldAmount) nc_inactivatedShouldAmount, sum(nc_jointImmuneAmount) nc_jointImmuneAmount, sum(nc_jointShouldAmount) nc_jointShouldAmount, sum(nc_jointVaccine) nc_jointVaccine from animal_disease.b_wnewcastle where nc_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY nc_regionCode order by nc_regionCode
